mapper.select: SELECT id, todo, detail, completed, priority, category, created_at, updated_at FROM todos
SELECT id, todo, detail, completed, priority, category, created_at ,updated_at FROM todos WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todos (todo, detail, completed, priority, category, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{todo}, #{detail}, #{completed}, #{priority}, #{category}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE todos SET todo = #{todo}, detail = #{detail}, completed = #{completed}, priority = #{priority}, category = #{category}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
